text: Sally, Irene and Mary is a 1938 American romantic comedy movie directed by William A. Seiter and starring Alice Faye, Fred Allen, Joan Davis, Tony Martin, Gregory Ratoff, Marjorie Weaver, Jimmy Durante, Gypsy Rose Lee, Barnett Parker, Mary Treen. It was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * Category:1938 romantic comedy movies Category:American romantic comedy movies Category:20th Century Fox movies Category:Movies directed by William A. Seiter
title: Sally, Irene and Mary (1938 movie)
